Just thought I'd let the group know that I downloaded heritrix-1.0.0
from sourceforge.net yesterday and installed it, following the
instructions.  No problems so far in RH7 Linux and Mozilla 1.7.2. 
(Netscape 4.79 could not manage to load the admin page.)  The Heritrix
GUI is up and running.  Great job, you guys.

So I am now off to learn how to run this thing.

Donna
